entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
